Congrats! You're Hired!

Welcome to the team! We'll get you caught up with the following steps.



Step 1

Make sure you have a Google account. If not, please create a Google account, Vantage uses Google login for security reasons.

Step 2

Head to the Vantage Tutor dashboard. This is where you will manage your lessons, schedules, and keep in contact with your students.

Step 3

Click on the sign in with Google button. This will log you into your new account. Once logged in, you will be guided through profile setup.

Interested? Get started for free today.


Try a homework tutoring or any standard course, with a trial class.

Enroll Now
